title: How will 5G change home internet and TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5G is cellular technology, so it won’t affect home internet, as far as emails, web browsing, etc., mm 5G is mainly for IoT - Internet of Things. Your refrigerator will be able to tell the supermarket that it’s running low on eggs. 500MHz 5G will give cellphones a faster internet connection. And maybe, one day, enough bandwidth for really fully-implemented RCS.
